title: Walking distance to Eastern Market, Detroit's Downtown.
posting_body: Here is your opportunity to own a piece of Detroit's unique history, in this turn-of-the-century, historic former schoolhouse!
3 PARKING SPACES, secured and gated; 2 assigned, open air parking spaces, & 1 garage space.
Residents have access to a large, common rooftop, offering panoramic views of the city, & a community garden!
The location is PERFECT for all of your spring/summer activities!
You'll enjoy being nestled next to Lafayette Park; walking distance to Eastern Market, Detroit's Downtown, and award-winning Riverwalk!
